name: Arcturus (working title) Pre-Alpha 0.09
description:
Open world with rich lore that is based off of a WIP novel series. Branching, choice and consequence narrative, faction-based quests and items, and immersive exploration elements. It is essentially a JRPG with four classes, but has some outlying mechanics, details and features *INSPIRED* by western rpgs and sandboxes like; games coming from Rockstar, Bioware, and Obsidian.

The game has only been in the works for roughly a month and is the dev's first project.. But is already showing a lot of progress with a Pre-Alpha demo spanning roughly 2 hours coming to the interwebs very soon!

The Developer is looking for any amateur developers interested in collaborating, as well as anyone interested in helping test the game for bugs, etc. as it is developed.

Feel free to directly message the page for a link to the Pre-Alpha demo, and expect a link to go public within the next few weeks. This is a humble debut, but the developer wished to get the barebones and general idea of the game to the public, and here it is.

https://www.facebook.com/Arcturus-working-title-280249766260056/
